summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Pcs Comb Mold for Resin Set Include 4Pcs Resin Comb Mold and 2Pcs Craft Mirror for DIY Hair Comb Craft Review Date: 2021/03/14 Store: Pistha Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Pistha', 'Size': '6 Piece Set', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.5 x 0.5 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Review Text: I don’t know if I did something wrong but my combs were not usable. It’s almost like the molds weren’t deep enough Review Title: Meh Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SJOLIE Pro-Blend DHA Barrier Cream (16oz) Review Date: 2021/05/10 Store: SJOLIE SUNLESS Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SJOLIE SUNLESS', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'vitamin_e', 'Unit Count': '16 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 7 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'BC1', 'Manufacturer': 'SJOLIE'} Review Text: Doesn’t work at all Review Title: Garbage Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mipruct 22PCS Nail files and buffers,Nail buffers blocks, Manicure tools with nail file and nail buffer block for acrylic nails,emery boards for nails Review Date: 2021/05/12 Store: Mipruct Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Mipruct', 'Unit Count': '22.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '7.68 x 7.28 x 0.71 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '782931783466'} Review Text: Not the best quality but if you’re in a pinch they will get the job done . They are really
small tho Review Title: Small Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: UV LED Nail Lamp LetGoShop Mini Portable Nail Dryer 36w Gel Polish UV Nail Light with 2 Timers USB Curing Nail Lamp for Gel Nail Pink Review Date: 2021/05/12 Store: LetGoShop Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 4.4 x 0.75 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: Wouldn’t even turn on. What a waste of money. UPDATE== I was sent a new lamp and thank god ! I love it .This little nail lamp perfect for travel which is exactly why I got it and affordable.I found myself reaching for this over my 80 watt lamp . It’s small, compact and easily stored . I’m truly impressed. I did not think this was going to work As well as it does .If you’re on the fence don’t be buy it you won’t regret it . Review Title: Garbage / UPDATE— READ Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AORAEM Mini Nail Dust Collector Portable Suction Dust Collector Machine Handheld Table Dust Sweeper with Brush for Nail Drills Acrylic Nails (Light Grey) Review Date: 2021/08/31 Store: AORAEM Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.02 x 3.58 x 2.8 inches; 4.66 Ounces'} Review Text: I wouldn’t call it a dust collector rather a small vaccum . But it got the job done Review Title: Not bad for price Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Makartt Nail Extension Gel Poly Nail Gel 30ML Builder Gel Poly Nail Extension Gel Trendy Nail Spring Summer with Slip Solution Art Design Easy DIY at Home Review Date: 2021/10/14 Store: Makartt Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Makartt', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Product Dimensions': '0.8 x 0.6 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: for the price you would think that this would be an amazing polygel but something was off I can’t put my finger on it. I seem to be having that problem with a lot of makartts polygel lately . It’s like they’re too soft .I also feel like this could have been more pigmented Review Title: Soft and lacking pigment Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 400PCS Acrylic Nail Paper Forms,Horseshoe Nail Extension Tips,Acrylic Nail/UV Gel Nail Extension Forms Guide Stickers for Women Girls Nail Salon DIY Supplies (Nail Forms Set) Review Date: 2022/06/06 Store: DouborQ Product Description: ['400 Pcs Professional Acrylic Nail Forms Guide Stickers Package Include: 4 x 100 PCS/Roll gel form builder for nails Adjustable width of the nail forms. Thickened, more adhesive, easy to apply and remove. Length and number marked on each nail form that provide an accurate guide for your nail design. These forms are great for sculpting a shape or length you desire. The nail forms are perfect for finger care, suitable for professional nail salon or home use. Nail Art Tips Material: Builders paper, self-adhesive Nail Forms Quantity: 400 Pcs nail forms for gel nails How to Use: 1.Peel off one guide from the form stickers 2.Pull the round sticker tips to back of extensions, strengthen hardness 3.Rip from the dotted line at the top of the stickers 4.Hold the scale of the sticker at front of the nail edge 5.Pinch the left part of the sticker when the scale fit with finger joint to holder the sticker to your nail 6.Make sure the sticker tight close to your nail 【100% satisfied】If you have any disappointing part, after-sale team will solve your problem and provide satisfied service within 24 HOURS.'] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'DouborQ', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 4.84 x 2.2 inches; 10.58 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'DouborQ'} Review Text: I liked that it came with a couple different kinds of forms. They were sturdy , good price and over all got the job done . Review Title: Like the variety Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user experienced several positive interactions with their purchases, particularly valuing products that effectively met their needs. Highlights include satisfaction with the compact and effective nail lamp that exceeded initial expectations, as well as appreciation for the sturdy and versatile nail forms that provided good value. Additionally, the barrier cream showed promise, contributing positively to their overall grooming routine. The user's feedback indicated a strong preference for items that delivered quality and practicality, enhancing their DIY nail experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite the positive aspects, the user encountered numerous disappointments with particular products. They reported issues with unusable molds and inadequate performance, particularly regarding the barrier cream that failed to deliver any results. Other items, such as the nail files and dust collector, received critiques for their lack of quality and effectiveness, leaving the user dissatisfied. Consistent complaints highlighted products that underperformed or did not meet expectations, impacting their overall shopping experience negatively.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experience reflected a mix of satisfaction and frustration. Positive feedback centered around effective, compact products that offered good value for DIY nail care. However, the disappointment was notable regarding several items that did not perform as expected, with quality issues recurring across different categories. This duality suggests that while the user found reliable products that enhanced their beauty routine, they also faced significant challenges with certain purchases that diminished their overall satisfaction.
